name: Brave Bird
description: You tuck in your wings and dive at a creature. Make a melee attack, dealing 2d10 + MOVE flying damage on a hit. On a hit, you also take a quarter of the total (rounded down) in typeless recoil damage.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 4d10 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.
